title: Definitions
context: [ยง481H-2] Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Contaminant&rdquo; shall be defined as provided in chapter 340E. &ldquo;Water treatment unit&rdquo; means a product, device, or system designed for personal, family, or household use and for which a claim or claims are made stating that it will improve the quality of water by reducing one or more contaminants through mechanical, physical, chemical, or biological processes or combinations thereof. [L 1991, c 260, pt of ยง1]
